author: Nick Nairn
method: Rub the ciabatta all over with olive oil. Heat a griddle pan and griddle the bread on both sides, until toasted. Place a slice of griddled ciabatta onto a serving plate and top with the rocket. Place the other slice of griddled ciabatta on top, followed by the Roquefort. To serve, drizzle with honey.
ingredients: 2 slices ciabatta,  2 tbsp olive oil,  ½ bunch rocket,  50g/1¾oz Roquefort, crumbled,  1 tbsp honey
